ratings.notes: proposed_contextual_controlled<TAB>4<TAB>5<TAB>3<TAB>4<TAB>The response is contextually relevant and maintains persona consistency, but could be more natural in tone to match the character's strictness.

baseline_no_context<TAB>2<TAB>1<TAB>3<TAB>2<TAB>Lacks both relevance and personality; it fails on all counts as a response from an old royal guard who is suspicious of strangers, especially in the context provided.
